articles.title: Webb Space Telescope's Coldest Instrument Reaches Operating Temperature Below Minus 447° F - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope will see the first galaxies to form after the big bang, but to do that its instruments first need to get cold – really cold. On April 7, Webb’s Mid-Infrared Instrument (MIRI) – a joint development by NASA and ESA (European Sp…
articles.content: In this illustration, the multilayered sunshield on NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope stretches out beneath the observatory’s honeycomb mirror. The sunshield is the first step in cooling down Webb’s … [+6717 chars]

articles.title: Cutting off Russian gas to cost Germany €220bn and trigger European recession - The Telegraph
articles.description: Europe's biggest economy would suffer a 6.5pc contraction if Russian energy is suspended, experts warn
articles.content: Separately, Moodys warned the difficulties of replacing Russian energy supplies, particularly gas, would lead governments to prioritise households, hospitals and transport for supplies, forcing some … [+1815 chars]

articles.title: Many cancer diagnoses made after emergency care visit - Hospital Healthcare Europe
articles.description: A large number of cancer diagnoses are made after emergency care visits and which are associated with a higher 12-month mortality
articles.content: A high proportion of cancer diagnoses occur through emergency care presentations and which are associated with a greater 12-month mortality compared to non-emergency care detected cancers. This was t… [+3301 chars]

articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: Villarreal's Champions League run continues as Bayern Munich waste key chances - ESPN
articles.description: The "Yellow Submarine" has claimed another of Europe's elite sides as Villarreal continue their run and make Bayern rue some missed opportunities.
articles.content: MUNICH, Germany -- The Allianz Arena speakers blared "Bitter Sweet Symphony" and "The Show Must Go On" as soon as the final whistle blew on Bayern Munich's Champions League hopes for another season, … [+5744 chars]
